ygData.subject: Re: Hey all
ygData.msgSnippet: You can also give bone chips to the Felwithe cleric guildmaster. Some more really good quests are the orc belt quest in Kaladim, and the diseased wolf pelt
ygData.messageBody:
You can also give bone chips to the Felwithe cleric guildmaster.
Some more really good quests are the orc belt quest in Kaladim, and
the diseased wolf pelt quest in Qeynos. The rabid grizzly quest is
probably too hard for a 10th level, but that quest is awesome!

Another good quest is the pirahna teeth quest in Rivervale.


>From: "Alan Raboy" <ARaboy@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Hey all
>Date: Fri, 12 Nov 1999 11:09:16 -0500
>
>Check out Allakazam's website for the details, but essentially there is a
>paladin at the paladin's guild that will take 4 bone chips and in return
>give
>you xp, an item (usually a tattered or patchwork) and coin. He stands
>on the left up the second flight of stairs near the doors into the living
>quarters.
>You can easily do this quest a dozen times a pop if the skel ruins are not
>camped as there are 5 skel spawn points at the ruins. I did this many
>times
>from lvl 8 to 10.
>
> >>> "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...> 11/12/99 11:04AM >>>
>From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
>
>I will check out the Ruins for sure now. What is this about the Paladin
>Guild and skeleton bones?
>
>Yilari, 10th level Cleric of Tunare
>
>
>
> > From: "Alan Raboy" <ARaboy@...>
> >
> > At level 10, I was soloing at the Undead Ruins in BB. If the zone is as
>empty as you say,
> > you can level rather quickly by beating up on the dwarf skeletons there,
>collecting
> > their bones and taking them to the Paladin guild for more xp and loot.
>This is better
> > than the tower because none of the mobs are linked. Also, if you
> > are able to find a tank to group with, the Goblin Warrior camp is good
>xp
>at your level
> > if the chessboard is camped.
> >
> >
> > >
>
>
><< text3.html >>
